function NPC_8894020:Init( NPCID ) --[[ USERDATA 1 : 보석에 누적되는 데미지 2 : Pain패턴을 보이기 위한 누적 데미지 3 : 보석의 밝기 State값( 체력에 따라 0~4의 값을 가진다. ) --]] NPC_ReserveUserData( NPCID, 3 )
NPC_8894020.LimitForBreakJewel = NPC_8894020.MaxHP*2/4
NPC_8894020.TalIdBackAttack0 = 211001103 NPC_8894020.TalIdBackAttack1 = 211001123 NPC_8894020.TalIdEnrage = 211001107
NPC_8894020.BufIdRegen1 = 40112 NPC_8894020.BufIdRegen2 = 40113 NPC_8894020.BufIdRegen3 = 40114 NPC_8894020.BufIdRegen4 = 40115 NPC_8894020.BufIdRegen5 = 40116
NPC_8894020.BufIdBerserk = 40111
NPC_8894020.TalIdPain0_1 = 211001117 NPC_8894020.TalIdPain0_2 = 211001118 NPC_8894020.TalIdPain1_1 = 211001133 NPC_8894020.TalIdPain2_2 = 211001134
end
-- 방향과 거리에 따라서 근접 평타나 뒷발길질 공격을 수행 function NPC_8894020:BackAttack( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local Dist = ThisNPC:DistanceTo( Enemy ) local IsRear = Enemy:IsRear( ThisNPC )
if Dist < 200 and IsRear then -- 뒤에있을경우 뒷발길질 if ThisNPC:GetMode() == 0 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_8894020.TalIdBackAttack0 ) else ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_8894020.TalIdBackAttack1 ) end end end
function NPC_8894020:OnSpawn( Info ) this:GainBuff( NPC_8894020.BufIdRegen1 ) end
function NPC_8894020:ProcessHitBody( ThisNPC, HitInfo ) if not ThisNPC:CheckBPart( 1 ) then HitInfo.Damage = 1 end
return HitInfo end
function NPC_8894020:ProcessHitJewel( ThisNPC, HitInfo )
if not HitInfo.Attacker:IsFront(ThisNPC) then return NPC_8894020:ProcessHitBody( ThisNPC, HitInfo ) end
NPC_8894020:ProcessPain( ThisNPC, HitInfo )
-- 가슴의 보석이 빠졌으면 체크를 중지한다. if ThisNPC:CheckBPart( 1 ) or ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent() == NPC_8894020.TalIdEnrage then return HitInfo end
local DmgAcc = ThisNPC:GetUserData( 1 ) + HitInfo.Damage ThisNPC:SetUserData( 1, DmgAcc )
-- 파츠 파괴 체크 if DmgAcc >= NPC_8894020.LimitForBreakJewel and HitInfo.Attacker:IsPlayer() then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:BreakPart( 1, HitInfo.Attacker ) NPC_8894020:RemoveBuff( ThisNPC, ThisNPC:GetUserData( 3 ) ) ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_8894020.BufIdBerserk, 0, 0 ) --ThisNPC:Aggro("random", 0)
ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_8894020.TalIdEnrage )
return HitInfo end
-- 보석 밝기값 조절 local State = ThisNPC:GetUserData( 3 ) local diff = NPC_8894020.LimitForBreakJewel - DmgAcc local NewState = math.floor( 5-(diff/NPC_8894020.LimitForBreakJewel)*5 ) --GLog("State "..State.." NewState "..NewState.."\n")
if State ~= NewState then ThisNPC:SetUserData( 3, NewState ) NPC_8894020:RemoveBuff( ThisNPC, State ) NPC_8894020:GainBuff( ThisNPC, NewState ) end
return HitInfo end
function NPC_8894020:ProcessPain( ThisNPC, HitInfo ) local TotDamage = ThisNPC:GetUserData( 2 ) + HitInfo.Damage local LimitValue = ThisNPC:GetMaxHP()/10
ThisNPC:SetUserData( 2, TotDamage )
if not (TotDamage > LimitValue) or not ChkMFForHitReaction(HitInfo) then return end
local Pain1ID = NPC_8894020.TalIdPain0_1 local Pain2ID = NPC_8894020.TalIdPain0_2
if ThisNPC:GetMode() ~= 0 then Pain1ID = NPC_8894020.TalIdPain1_1 Pain2ID = NPC_8894020.TalIdPain1_2 end
if not ThisNPC:IsCooldown( Pain1ID ) then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( Pain1ID ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 2, 0) elseif not ThisNPC:IsCooldown( Pain2ID ) then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( Pain2ID ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 2, 0) end end
function NPC_8894020:RemoveBuff( ThisNPC, State ) --GLog( "NPC_8894020:RemoveBuffByState" .. State .."\n" )
if State == 0 then ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_8894020.BufIdRegen1 ) elseif State == 1 then ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_8894020.BufIdRegen2 ) elseif State == 2 then ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_8894020.BufIdRegen3 ) elseif State == 3 then ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_8894020.BufIdRegen4 ) elseif State == 4 then ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_8894020.BufIdRegen5 ) end end
function NPC_8894020:GainBuff( ThisNPC, State ) --GLog( "NPC_8894020:GainBuffByState" .. State .."\n" )
if State == 0 then ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_8894020.BufIdRegen1 ) elseif State == 1 then ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_8894020.BufIdRegen2 ) elseif State == 2 then ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_8894020.BufIdRegen3 ) elseif State == 3 then ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_8894020.BufIdRegen4 ) elseif State == 4 then ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_8894020.BufIdRegen5 ) end end
function NPC_8894020:OnHitCapsule_1_0(HitInfo) return NPC_8894020:ProcessHitJewel( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_8894020:OnHitCapsule_1_1(HitInfo) return NPC_8894020:ProcessHitBody( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_8894020:OnHitCapsule_2_0(HitInfo) return NPC_8894020:ProcessHitJewel( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_8894020:OnHitCapsule_2_1(HitInfo) return NPC_8894020:ProcessHitBody( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_8894020:OnHitCapsule_2_2(HitInfo) return NPC_8894020:ProcessHitBody( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_8894020:OnHitCapsule_2_3(HitInfo) return NPC_8894020:ProcessHitJewel( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_8894020:OnHitCapsule_3_0(HitInfo) return NPC_8894020:ProcessHitJewel( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_8894020:OnHitCapsule_3_1(HitInfo) return NPC_8894020:ProcessHitBody( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_8894020:OnHitCapsule_3_2(HitInfo) return NPC_8894020:ProcessHitBody( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_8894020:OnHitCapsule_3_3(HitInfo) return NPC_8894020:ProcessHitJewel( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_8894020:OnHitCapsule_4_0(HitInfo) return NPC_8894020:ProcessHitJewel( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_8894020:OnHitCapsule_5_0(HitInfo) return NPC_8894020:ProcessHitJewel( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_8894020:OnHitCapsule_5_1(HitInfo) return NPC_8894020:ProcessHitBody( this, HitInfo ) end
